attributes.action: Theresa May must stand down as PM now. We want out of the EU now.
attributes.additional_details: The 2016 Referendum vote of 52% to 48% in favour of Leave
attributes.background: The United Kingdom voted to leave the EU. We are still stuck in the EU. The Prime Minister has failed to get a 'Remain' deal through Parliament. No other options have been approved by Parliament. The people want out of the EU now.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister.
